results.content:
(initial review after 25%)
I am having a thrilling experience with this course.  This 26-hour course (will go up once testing and job interview sections are added) is filled with invaluable knowledge.  Abd, rather than relying on slides or boring theory, gets straight into coding actual website or parts of it; hence, we can actually see how, for example, a three-column section that we come across in real websites is created.  

Additionally, Abd has taken care to use adequate font-size/zoom level so that it's easy for bespectacled students like me also to easily code along without any trouble.     

All in all, i am optimistic that i would have gained lots of knowledge by the end of this course and hence have no hesitation in recommending it to prospective students.

Great job, Abd!  Keep it up!  Best wishes for your future courses and projects!

response.content:
thank you so much
I am really happy that i could help you some how.

all the best

Abd, rather than relying on slides or boring theory, gets straight into coding actual website or parts of it; hence, we can actually see how, for example, a three-column section that we come across in real websites is created.

Additionally, Abd has taken care to use adequate font-size/zoom level so that it's easy for bespectacled students like me also to easily code along without any trouble.

All in all, i am optimistic that i would have gained lots of knowledge by the end of this course and hence have no hesitation in recommending it to prospective students.

Great job, Abd! Keep it up! Best wishes for your future courses and projects!

results.content:
Professeur excellent. Très patient. Les notions sont répétées plusieurs fois au cours des différents exercices. On réutilise les notions de départ et on enrichit petit à petit avec des paramètres supplémentaires. Tout s'éclaire pour moi concernant le design in the browser. Bravo Abd Alwahah Abdullah pour ta pédagogie. 
Le Display Flex est un game changer !!! :)

results.content: not sure why the same thing had been showing in different videos. one section was enough to get an understanding of what is expected of the top navigation and how to do different ways of styling. in this there are many and that makes is little boring to go forward.
